docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON--The 50 million Americans who buy cigarettes are increasingly becoming pawns in a protracted tug-of-war between the embattled tobacco industry and Federal and private pressure groups urging smokers to kick the habit. That fact became strikingly apparent last week as Dr. Julius B. Richmond, the Surgeon General of the United States, issued a new report citing "overwhelming proof" that smoking is hazardous to health.
